_header: Love is bliss in mans mind
_description: On Christian Love — four couplets in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook

NLS18721.First Lines:
Loue is blisse in mannis mynde& loue is fre in mannis
                    kynde…
NLS18721.Last Lines:
…Loue is sewed as it were kouth& is nout in herte als is
                    in mouth
NLS18721.Editions:
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild,
                        ed.  
             English Lyrics of the XIIIth Century.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1932: 209.
